text: I love my life because it gave me you. I love you because you are my life.
You're my only choice because no one else makes me happy like you.
You're special to me in every way. Thank you for being who you are.
I like the way you make me feel even when you're nowhere near.
You wanna know who I'm in love with? Read the first word again.
My favourite place in the world is next to you.
Together forever. Never be apart. Maybe in distance. But never in heart.
If I were blind, within my heart I could still see the beauty that is you.
Have I mention today how lucky I am to be in love with you?
Mon coeur est Ã  toi.
Distance means nothing when Jean means everything.
Never give up because great things take time
You are the most beautiful thing I keep inside my heart.
I am in love with you and all your little things.
When two people really love each other, they always find a way to make it work.
Your love is all I need to feel complete.
I am the happiest when I'm right next to you!
Thank you for showing me what butterflies feel like.
My first thought in the morning is always you.
My last thought before I go to bed is always you.
You're the meaning in my life. You're the inspiration.
You bring feeling to my life. You're the inspiration.
